description:
The MYD11C2.005 dataset was decommissioned as of April 9, 2018. 

The MODIS/Aqua LST/E 8-Day L3 Global CMG product (Short name: MYD11C2) is an 8-day composited average, derived from the MYD11C1 daily global product, and stored as clear-sky LST values during an 8-day period in a 0.05 degree (5600 meters) geographic CMG. MYD11C2, therefore, inherits all the structural features of its MYD11C1 parent except for the temporal configuration. Please refer to the MYD11C1 product documentation for all algorithm-related details.

The MYD11C2 product comprises the following Science Data Set (SDS) layers for daytime and nighttime observations: LSTs, quality control assessments, observation times, view zenith angles, clear sky coverages, and emissivities for Bands 20, 22, 23, 29, 31, and 32.

The V5 Aqua/MODIS LST/E products, including MYD11C2, are validated to Stage-2 through field campaigns and radiance-based validation studies. Further details regarding MODIS land product validation for the LST/E products are available from the following URL: http://landval.gsfc.nasa.gov/ProductStatus.php?ProductID=MYD11

This product is ready for use in science applications/publications.

The V5 collection is not consistent with V4 and V41, and users should exercise caution as they plan to use the different collections.  Please refer to the LP DAAC MODIS product table at https://lpdaac.usgs.gov/products/modis_products_table/myd11c2  for additional detailed product version information.

V005 Data Set Characteristics: 
Area: global
Image Dimensions: 3600 x 7200 rows/columns 
File Size: ~70 MB compressed
Resolution: 0.05 degrees (~5.6 km at the Equator) 
Projection: Latitude/Longitude Grid 
Data Format: HDF-EOS 
Science Data Sets (SDS HDF Layers): 17
Temporal Range: 2002-07-04 to 2017-03-30
title: MODIS/Aqua Land Surface Temperature/Emissivity 8-Day L3 Global 0.05Deg CMG V005

usgs.title: Direct Download [1]
usgs.description: USGS EarthExplorer (EE) provides users the ability to query, search and order archived ASTER and MODIS products available from the LP DAAC.  Registered users of EE have access to additional features than guest users.
